uk.fictitiousurl.serialencoder

Interface SerialEncoder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SerialEncoderImpl, SerialEncoderImplJOSBASE64, SerialEncoderImplXSTREAMXML

    public interface SerialEncoder
    Provides methods to encode an Object to a String or a file and to decode it back using some form of serialization.
    Since:
    2.0
    Version:
    3.0.01
    Author:
    Oliver Smart <osmart01@dcs.bbk.ac.uk>

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Object decode(String str)
      Decodes a string created by encode(Object obj) recovering the Object.
      String encode(Object obj)
      Converts the supplied obj to a string so that it can be subsequently recovered by decode(String str).
      Object retreiveFromFile(String inFileName)
      retrieves an object from a file created by saveToFile
      void saveToFile(Object obj, String outFileName)
      saves the object to a file, so that it can be read at a later time by retreiveFromFile

    • Method Detail

      • decode

        Object decode(String str)
        Decodes a string created by encode(Object obj) recovering the Object.
        Parameters:
        str - the String to decode
        Returns:
        the object
        Throws:
        RuntimeException - if there is any problem decoding the string

      • encode

        String encode(Object obj)
        Converts the supplied obj to a string so that it can be subsequently recovered by decode(String str).
        Parameters:
        obj - the object to encode (may need to implement Serializable)
        Returns:
        encoded String containing information about the object
        Throws:
        RuntimeException - if there is any problem encoding the object

      • retreiveFromFile

        Object retreiveFromFile(String inFileName)
        retrieves an object from a file created by saveToFile
        Parameters:
        inFileName - the name for the input file (must exist)
        Returns:
        the Object encoded in the file
        Throws:
        UncheckedIOException - if there is a problem opening or reading from the file
        RuntimeException - if there is a problem in decoding the object

      • saveToFile

        void saveToFile(Object obj,
                String outFileName)
        saves the object to a file, so that it can be read at a later time by retreiveFromFile
        Parameters:
        obj - the Object to be saved (may need to be Serializable)
        outFileName - the name for the output file
        Throws:
        UncheckedIOException - if there is a problem opening or writing to the file
        RuntimeException - if there is a problem in encoding the object
